text: James LoMenzo (born January 13th, 1959) is an American bass guitarist. He was a member of the band White Lion from 1984 to 1991. He later played the bass for Megadeth, Black Label Society, and Slash's Snakepit. He toured with Megadeth starting in August 2021, and joined the band again in June 2022. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Living people Category:20th-century American guitarists Category:American bass guitarists Category:Megadeth members
title: James LoMenzo
